trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> for printing a document together with its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: Gir et <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> skriver ut et dokument sammen med tilknyttede merknader.

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationDocumentPaginator class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationDocumentPaginator klassen brytes den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>angitt til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren for å legge til brukeren merknader i sider for utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> and annotation storage <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"> </xref> klassen basert på et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> og merknad lagring <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: By default this constructor sets the text flow direction to <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard angi denne konstruktøren at teksten flyten skal <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>

trans-unit.source: If needed you can use one of the alternate <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor overloads to set the text <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> to a different setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nødvendig kan du bruke en av alternativt <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren overlastingene angi teksten <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>til en annen innstilling.</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>klasse brytes den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>angitt til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør for å legge til merknader for brukeren sidene for utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentet for å legge til trykt merknadene.

trans-unit.source: The annotation storage stream to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden lagring dataflyten til å hente merknader fra.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"> </xref> klassen basert på et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default this constructor sets the text flow direction to <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard angi denne konstruktøren at teksten flyten skal <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>

trans-unit.source: If needed you can use one of the alternate <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor overloads to set the text <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> to a different setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nødvendig kan du bruke en av alternativt <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren overlastingene angi teksten <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>til en annen innstilling.</xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>klasse brytes den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>angitt til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør for å legge til merknader for brukeren sidene for utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentet for å legge til trykt merknadene.

trans-unit.source: The store to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: Lager å hente merknader fra.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>, annotation storage <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and text <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"> </xref> klassen basert på et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref>, merknad lagring <xref:System.IO.Stream>, og tekst <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>klasse brytes den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>angitt til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør for å legge til merknader for brukeren sidene for utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentet for å legge til trykt merknadene.

trans-unit.source: The annotation storage stream to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden lagring dataflyten til å hente merknader fra.

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction, <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten flytretningen <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"></xref> class based on a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref>, and text <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator"> </xref> klassen basert på et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref>, og tekst <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator> class wraps the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> specified to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to add the user annotations to the pages for printing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>klasse brytes den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>angitt til den <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør for å legge til merknader for brukeren sidene for utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator>

trans-unit.source: The document to add the printed annotations to.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentet for å legge til trykt merknadene.

trans-unit.source: The store to retrieve the annotations from.
trans-unit.target: Lager å hente merknader fra.

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction, <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten flytretningen <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all asynchronous operations initiated with a given userState object.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter alle asynkrone operasjoner startet med en gitt userState objektet.

trans-unit.source: The unique application-defined identifier passed in the call to start the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for Programdefinert sendt i kallet til å starte den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Forces a pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger paginering av innhold, oppdateringer <> </> *> med nye totalt og angir <> </> *> til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Immediately after ComputePageCount returns, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> will be `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> property will reflect the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: Rett etter ComputePageCount returnerer <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>blir `true` og <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>egenskapen gjenspeiler det totale antallet sider.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of pages may change if the annotation content is modified or the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> is changed.
trans-unit.target: Antallet sider kan endres hvis merknad innholdet er endret eller <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous pagination of the content, updates <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> with the new total, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron paginering av innhold, oppdateringer <> </> *> med nye totalt og angir <> </> *> til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> når den er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The `userState` parameter is intended for use with <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A> method if the application wishes to cancel the asynchronous operation before completion.
trans-unit.target: Den `userState` parameteren er ment for bruk med <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>metoden hvis programmet ønsker å avbryte den asynkrone operasjonen før fullføring.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application-defined object for identifying the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: En Programdefinert objektet til å identifisere den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> together with associated user-annotations for a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> sammen med tilknyttede brukeren-merknader for et angitt tall.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: Nullbasert sidetallet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The for the specified pageNumber; or , if the specified pageNumber does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den for det angitte pageNumber ; eller , hvis den angitte pageNumber finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> together with associated user-annotations for a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer asynkront en <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> sammen med tilknyttede brukeren-merknader for et angitt tall.

trans-unit.source: The `userState` parameter is intended for use with <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A> method if the application wishes to cancel the asynchronous operation before completion.
trans-unit.target: Den `userState` parameteren er ment for bruk med <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>metoden hvis programmet ønsker å avbryte den asynkrone operasjonen før fullføring.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based page number of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Nullbasert sidetallet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage"> </xref> til å hente.

trans-unit.source: An application-defined object that is used to identify the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Et Programdefinert objekt som brukes til å identifisere den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> is the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*>er det totale antallet sider.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*>

trans-unit.source: IsPageCountValid may switch from `true` to `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A> recomputed if a change to the content or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> triggers repagination.
trans-unit.target: IsPageCountValid kan bytte fra `true` til `false` og <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>skal beregnes på nytt om en endring i innholdet eller <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>utløser paginering.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pagination is complete and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> represents the total number of pages; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if pagination is in process and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageCount*> represents the number of pages currently formatted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis paginering er fullført og <> </> *> representerer Totalt antall sider; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis paginering pågår og <> </> *> representerer antallet sider som er formatert.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the number of pages currently formatted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir antallet sider som er formatert.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> may change from `true` to `false` and PageCount recomputed if a change to the content or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> triggers repagination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>kan endres fra `true` til `false` og PageCount skal beregnes på nytt om en endring i innholdet eller <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>utløser paginering.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A></xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the total number of annotation pages; otherwise if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationDocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the number of pages currently formatted (pagination in process).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, totalt antall merknad sider; Ellers hvis <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, antallet sider som er formatert (paginering pågår).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suggested width and height of each page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir anbefalte bredden og høyden på hver side.

trans-unit.source: PageSize gets or sets the *suggested* size for formatting pages.
trans-unit.target: PageSize henter eller angir den *foreslåtte* størrelsen for formatering sider.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A> property to get the actual size of the page (if it is required the actual size may be cropped from the suggested PageSize).
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A>til å hente den faktiske størrelsen på siden (Hvis det kreves faktisk størrelse kan bli beskåret fra den foreslåtte PageSize).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The suggested width and height for formatting pages.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalte bredde og høyde for formatering sider.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source document that is being paginated.
trans-unit.target: Henter kildedokument er blir paginert.

trans-unit.source: The source document that is being paginated.
trans-unit.target: Kildedokument som er i paginert.
